text: František Repka (born 9 January 1966) is a Slovak skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1988 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Czechoslovakia Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1988 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Poprad
title: František Repka
